title: Windsor E
content:
Hi All.   
   
I've just been assigned a lettering project at school. I'm to draw a cap E from Windsor Bold. Trouble is, I can't find Windsor Bold. Would it be possible for someone to send me the outline of the E as an illustrator file?   
   
If bold doesn't exist digitally, perhaps the Regular weight E outline?   
   
   
 [randyjonesdesign@hotmail.com](mailto:randyjonesdesign@hotmail.com)   
   
Thanks,   
Randy
author: anonymous

comments.content:
You lucky fellow! His lectures must be a hoot.   
Saw him at TypeCon2001 and it was the most   
entertaining speech on design I've witnessed.   
   
Where is he teaching?

Ed Benguiat.   
Which explains the affinity for Windsor.   
Don't know about disco attraction though.   
   
Cheers.   
Randy

is Ed Benguiat.   
   
One need only look at Souvenier, Benguiat, and Tiffany.   
This is a man who likes Windsor.   
   
Randy

School of Visual Arts.   
Lucky indeed. Yes he is an entertaining and
the man who launched the woody allen film credits template if I recall correctly too.

[http://www.myfonts.com/Character?id=0045&vid=136720&charset=CP2&charpage=](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018212306/http:/www.myfonts.com/Character?id=0045&vid=136720&charset=CP2&charpage=)   
BTW, does your teacher like disco?   
   
hhp
